long_description: The REI Flash Air Pillow adds a mere 1.5 oz. to your backpack, yet helps you enjoy a comfortable night's sleep. Rounded shape fits neatly at the head of mummy-style sleeping bags. The pillow inflates quickly, requiring just a few breaths of air. Made of durable polyester fabric. The REI Flash Air Pillow has an attached elastic band that secures the rolled-up pillow for compact storage.
short_description: The REI Flash Air Pillow adds a mere 1.5 oz. to your backpack, yet helps you enjoy a comfortable night's sleep.
